languages.text: "Все виновные будут сурово наказаны, Ваша Светлость, но до тех пор мы полагаемся на выживших защитников планеты — прошу вас, давайте отложим суды и казни до стабилизации ситуации!"

"All guilty parties will receive severe punishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but until then, we must rely on the surviving defenders — please, let us postpone the trials and executions until the situation has stabilised!"
languages.original_text: "Все виновные будут сурово наказаны, Ваша Светлость, но до тех пор мы полагаемся на выживших защитников планеты — прошу вас, давайте отложим суды и казни до стабилизации ситуации!"

traits.locale_text: "All guilty parties will receive severe punishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but until then, we must rely on the surviving defenders — please, let us postpone the trials and the executions until the situation has stabilized!"

"All guilty parties will receive severe punishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but until then, we must rely on the surviving defenders — please, let us postpone the trials and the executions until the situation has stabilized!"

"All guilty parties will receive severe punishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but until then, we must rely on the surviving defenders — please, let us postpone the trials and executions until the situation has stabilised!"

"All guilty parties will receive severe punishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but until then, we must rely on the surviving defenders — please, let us postpone the trials and executions until the situation has stabilised!"

"All guilty parties will receive severe punishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but until then, we must rely on the surviving defenders — please, let us postpone the trials and executions until the situation has stabilised!"

languages.text: 「襲撃に対応しきれなかった罪人は全員厳罰に処します、{mf|陛下|陛下}。しかし、それまでは生き残った防衛兵に頼らざるを得ません――どうか状況が安定するまで裁判と処刑を延期ください！」
languages.original_text: "All guilty parties will receive severe punishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but until then, we must rely on the surviving defenders — please, let us postpone the trials and executions until the situation has stabilised!"

traits.locale_text: 「襲撃に対応しきれなかった罪人は全員厳罰に処します、{mf|陛下|陛下}。しかし、それまでは生き残った防衛兵に頼らざるを得ません――どうか状況が安定するまで裁判と処刑を延期ください！」

languages.text: “所有罪不容赦之人，都将受到应得的惩罚，大人。但在那之前，我们依然需要残存防御部队的力量。请您推迟审判和处决，直到局势稳定下来为止吧！”
languages.original_text: "All guilty parties will receive severe punishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but until then, we must rely on the surviving defenders — please, let us postpone the trials and executions until the situation has stabilised!"

traits.locale_text: “所有罪不容赦之人，都将受到应得的惩罚，大人。但在那之前，我们依然需要残存防御部队的力量。请您推迟审判和处决，直到局势稳定下来为止吧！”

languages.text: «Todas las partes culpables recibirán un grave castigo, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero hasta entonces necesitamos a los defensores supervivientes. ¡Por favor, posponga los juicios y las ejecuciones hasta que la situación se estabilice!».
languages.original_text: "All guilty parties will receive severe punishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but until then, we must rely on the surviving defenders — please, let us postpone the trials and executions until the situation has stabilised!"

traits.locale_text: «Todas las partes culpables recibirán un grave castigo, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero hasta entonces necesitamos a los defensores supervivientes. ¡Por favor, posponga los juicios y las ejecuciones hasta que la situación se estabilice!».

languages.text: « Tous les coupables seront sévèrement châtiés, Votre Seigneurie, mais en attendant, nous n'avons pas d'autre choix que de compter sur les défenseurs survivants. Je vous en prie, patientons jusqu'à ce que la situation soit entièrement stabilisée avant d'organiser des procès et exécutions ! »
languages.original_text: "All guilty parties will receive severe punishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but until then, we must rely on the surviving defenders — please, let us postpone the trials and executions until the situation has stabilised!"

traits.locale_text: « Tous les coupables seront sévèrement châtiés, Votre Seigneurie, mais en attendant, nous n'avons pas d'autre choix que de compter sur les défenseurs survivants. Je vous en prie, patientons jusqu'à ce que la situation soit entièrement stabilisée avant d'organiser des procès et exécutions ! »

languages.text: "Wer schuldig ist, wird schwer bestraft, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber bis dahin brauchen wir die überlebenden Verteidiger – lasst uns bitte Prozesse und Hinrichtungen verschieben, bis die Lage sich stabilisiert hat!"
languages.original_text: "All guilty parties will receive severe punishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but until then, we must rely on the surviving defenders — please, let us postpone the trials and executions until the situation has stabilised!"

traits.locale_text: "Wer schuldig ist, wird schwer bestraft, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber bis dahin brauchen wir die überlebenden Verteidiger – lasst uns bitte Prozesse und Hinrichtungen verschieben, bis die Lage sich stabilisiert hat!"

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, suçluların tümüne ağır cezalar verilecektir. Ancak o zamana dek hayatta kalan savunmacılara bel bağlamamız lazım gelecek. Yalvarırım durumlar düzelene dek mahkemeleri ve infazları erteleyin!"
languages.original_text: "All guilty parties will receive severe punishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but until then, we must rely on the surviving defenders — please, let us postpone the trials and executions until the situation has stabilised!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, suçluların tümüne ağır cezalar verilecektir. Ancak o güne dek hayatta kalan askerlerimize bel bağlamamız lazım gelecek. Yalvarırım mahkemeleri ve infazları erteleyin!"
